resources.string: Oops, something went wrong when trying to login. Please try again.
Login failed; Username or password is incorrect.
Oops, something went wrong when trying to register your account. Please try again.
Not a valid name. Name must be at least 4 characters long and no longer than 50 characters.
Not a valid password. Password must contain one uppercase and lowercase letter, at least one number and be at least 9 characters long
Both email and password are invalid
Email, password and name are all invalid
A left chevron to go back to login
